settings.title: Booksio
settings.subtitle: WHERE EVERYDAY
settings.text:
Here at Booksio, each month we’ll highlight a specific charitable theme close to our hearts, and the highlighted organization(s) with the core mission to improve and address it. 10% of your sales will automatically go to making a difference towards our theme, so sit back, shop, and let us take care of the rest! If another cause or charity is dearer to your heart, just visit your account profile and pick a charity from our approved list.

Thank you for joining the Booksio community and making an impact on the world around you.

settings.title: April Featured Cause
settings.subtitle: Earth Day, Every Day
settings.text_1:
Here at Booksio, we believe our planet is our home and our most precious resource. We want to do what we can to protect wildlife, clean the environment, and combat climate change. That’s why during the month of April, we will give 10% of all profits to the Clean Air Task Force, Environmental Defense Fund, and the Nature Conservancy.
To learn more about these worthy organizations, please go to our April Featured Cause page for more information.

In the month of April and throughout 2023, we encourage you to join us in reading and learning about what we can all do to make Earth Day, Every Day.

settings.title: Subscribe To Our Newsletter
settings.text:
Have you signed up yet? Subscribe to our newsletter and we’ll keep you up-to-date on all of your

favorite authors, charities, books and special promotions. So don’t wait, sign up today!
